toc.text: 为 Arch Linux 添加额外源

pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"BlackArch 是一款基于 Arch Linux 的为渗透测试及安全研究人员开发的发行版，相当于 Arch 版的 BackTrack/Kali。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["仓库地址：",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://blackarch.org/blackarch/","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://blackarch.org/blackarch/"}]]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"使用说明","children":"使用说明"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"为-arch-linux-添加额外源","children":"为 Arch Linux 添加额外源"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"适用于给已经安装完毕的 Arch Linux 添加 BlackArch 源的情景。"}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/BlackArch/blackarch/issues/3505","rel":"nofollow","children":"导入 GPG key"}],"："]}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"pacman-key --recv-keys 7533BAFE69A25079
pacman-key --finger 7533BAFE69A25079
pacman-key --lsign-key 7533BAFE69A25079"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/pacman.conf"}]," 文件末尾添加两行："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"[blackarch]
Server = {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/$repo/os/$arch","codeLanguage":"ini"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["由于一些软件依赖 32 位的库，需要取消掉 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/pacman.conf"}]," 中 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"multilib"}]," 的注释，详见 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Official_repositories#Enabling_multilib","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Official_repositories#Enabling_multilib"}],"。"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["安装 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"blackarch-keyring"}]," 包来保持 GPG key 更新："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}pacman -Sy blackarch-keyring"}],"
"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["注：BlackArch 软件源仅包含其打包的工具等软件。如果需要更换 Arch Linux 基础系统的软件源，请查看 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/archlinux/","children":"Arch Linux 帮助"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"安装-blackarch","children":"安装 BlackArch"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"适用于将 BlackArch 作为发行版安装并使用的情景。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["编辑 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/pacman.d/blackarch-mirrorlist"}],"，在文件的最顶端添加："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/pacman.d/blackarch-mirrorlist","code":"Server = {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/$repo/os/$arch","codeLanguage":"ini"}]]}]

meta.title: BlackArch 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
